entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.canscroll: Allows the scroll wheel to move a tooltip.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.usewasd: Allows the WASD keys to move a tooltip.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.resetonunlock: Resets the position of a tooltip when it is not visible.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.uselshift:
Use left-shift for horizontal scrolling.
(unaffected by keybind)
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.invertxscroll:
Invert the horizontal tooltip movement 
when scrolling.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.invertyscroll:
Invert the vertical tooltip movement 
when scrolling.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.scrolldistanc: Tooltip displacement when scrolling with the mouse.
Tooltip displacement when moving it with the keyboard.
entrytooltip.tooltipscroll.smoothness:
How fast the tooltip should slide between positions.
Range of [0.05 - 1], where 1 is instant.
